channel.title: Searching for Experienced Developers - RGPvP Recruitment Thread
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LgeOfaj.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4]Welcome to the Revealed-Gaming recruitment thread. [/SIZE][/B] We are currently seeking active and dedicated developers for an upcoming project. The server is using a great clean base to start out with, and we are adding custom content for a PvP/Spawn based economy.
Netty Framework Grahams RS2Server Game Engine All Dupes Patched
[b]We have a DEDICATED HOST, WEBHOST, AND .COM![/b]
[SIZE=4][U][B]About Me:[/B][/U][/SIZE] My name is Jordan Patterson, and I am the Owner and Lead developer of Revealed-Gaming. I have been developing java for 7 years, and am fluent in multiple other computer languages including but not limited to; Java, PhP, C++, and LUA Scripting. I am also proficient with Joomla, a CMS platform. I have Owned/Operated 3 successful private servers, generating over $1500 in revenue from my latest online RSPS (It's not about the money!)
I currently own and operate my own LLC, Web-Bros, where I market and contract website development deals for small business owners in my local city. I am an experienced DEVELOPER AND MARKETING EXPERT who needs a great development team to flourish this PvP Server.
[U][SIZE=4][b]Development Requirements:[/b][/SIZE][/U] -Minimum 1 year Java development or position related experience -Mature, intelligent, well spoken individual who understands the relationship between prioritization and success.
[U][B][SIZE=4]Available Development Positions:[/SIZE][/B][/U] [QUOTE][B]Server Content Developer [0/1][/B] -Proficient with the Project Insanity Engine -Available to develop a minimum of 4 hours daily -Good imagination, and able to make imaginative ideas come to life through development -Able to creatively develop collective ideas without framework of existing systems in place -This position will be implementing never before seen content into Revealed-Gaming
[B]Server Patch Developer [0/1][/B] -Proficient with the Project Insanity Engine -Available to develop a minimum of 4 hours daily -Able to quickly assess and resolve server dupes, glitches, and bugs that will be found during the beta stage -This position will be developing the content that is already in Revealed-Gaming
[B]Client Developer [0/1][/B] -Proficient with the Project Insanity Client -Available to develop a minimum of 4 hours daily -Able to add new client features -Able to develop existing client features[/QUOTE]
[spoiler=Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MI64BFy.png[/img] 7 different GameFrame choices. [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://www.nzbike.com/app_themes/default/layout/skype.png[/img] SyndicateRG Add my Skype for an immediate interview. [/CENTER]

item.title: Searching for Experienced Developers - RGPvP Recruitment Thread
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I am beast:

am fluent in multiple other computer languages including but not limited to; Java, joomla, PhP, C++, and LUA Scripting. I have

Since when was Joomla a programming language you asshat?

Why don’t you show us some of your work, oh mighty one.

Read full topic

item.title: Searching for Experienced Developers - RGPvP Recruitment Thread
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I am beast:

It has Netty Framework, Grahams RS2Server Game Engine, and can hold over 1000 players.

wow so sophisticated wow netty omg grahams game engine wow over 1000 players

putting grahams engine into your shitty pi server will not effect it’s performance and has no real effect on the server at all. The ‘1000 players’ were not real players, they were bots. You can’t really replicate 1000 players without actually having 1000 different players

Read full topic
item.source: Searching for Experienced Developers - RGPvP Recruitment Thread

item.title: Searching for Experienced Developers - RGPvP Recruitment Thread

@I_am_beast wrote:

The base we are working with is far more sophisticated than the average Project Insanity.
It has Netty Framework, Grahams RS2Server Game Engine, and can hold over 1000 players.

item.title: Searching for Experienced Developers - RGPvP Recruitment Thread
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[CENTER]

[B][SIZE=4]Welcome to the Revealed-Gaming recruitment thread. [/SIZE][/B]
We are currently seeking active and dedicated developers for an upcoming project.
The server is using a great clean base to start out with, and we are adding custom content for a PvP/Spawn based economy.

Netty Framework
Grahams RS2Server Game Engine
All Dupes Patched

We have a DEDICATED HOST, WEBHOST, AND .COM!

[SIZE=4][U][B]About Me:[/B][/U][/SIZE]
My name is Jordan Patterson, and I am the Owner and Lead developer of Revealed-Gaming. I have been developing java for 7 years,
and am fluent in multiple other computer languages including but not limited to; Java, PhP, C++, and LUA Scripting. I am also proficient with Joomla, a CMS platform.
I have Owned/Operated 3 successful private servers, generating over $1500 in revenue from my latest online RSPS (It’s not about the money!)

I currently own and operate my own LLC, Web-Bros, where I market and contract website development deals for small business owners in my local city.
I am an experienced DEVELOPER AND MARKETING EXPERT who needs a great development team to flourish this PvP Server.

[U][SIZE=4]Development Requirements:[/SIZE][/U]
-Minimum 1 year Java development or position related experience
-Mature, intelligent, well spoken individual who understands the relationship between prioritization and success.

[U][B][SIZE=4]Available Development Positions:[/SIZE][/B][/U]

[QUOTE][B]Server Content Developer [0/1][/B]
-Proficient with the Project Insanity Engine
-Available to develop a minimum of 4 hours daily
-Good imagination, and able to make imaginative ideas come to life through development
-Able to creatively develop collective ideas without framework of existing systems in place
-This position will be implementing never before seen content into Revealed-Gaming

[B]Server Patch Developer [0/1][/B]
-Proficient with the Project Insanity Engine
-Available to develop a minimum of 4 hours daily
-Able to quickly assess and resolve server dupes, glitches, and bugs that will be found during the beta stage
-This position will be developing the content that is already in Revealed-Gaming

[B]Client Developer [0/1][/B]
-Proficient with the Project Insanity Client
-Available to develop a minimum of 4 hours daily
-Able to add new client features
-Able to develop existing client features[/QUOTE]

[spoiler=Media]
7 different GameFrame choices.
[/spoiler]

SyndicateRG
Add my Skype for an immediate interview.
[/CENTER]
